programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: Milk Teeth
programme.desc: Living in a small rural community, Skalde navigates societal stigma due to having an “outsider” mother. When she befriends a mysterious girl in the woods, Skalde jeopardizes everything, struggling to balance loyalty to her community and her newfound bond.

programme.title: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre Werner, a revered and devoted country doctor, discovers that he is suffering from an inoperable tumor. As a doctor from the city arrives to help him with his practice, Werner is troubled by the thought that he is no longer irreplaceable.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Soul Circle
programme.desc: Two detectives find a newborn baby in a basket on Lake Constance, with a mysterious message, and whose mother, Rita Hafner, was presumed murdered 6 months ago. Two detectives must investigate mysterious symbols and dark legends in order to save her.

programme.title: King Of The Belgians
programme.desc: King Nicolas II of the Belgians is on a state visit to Istanbul when his country falls apart. With a solar storm shutting down air travel and communications, he must travel by road across the Balkans to save his country.

programme.title: Murders In Brouage
programme.desc: A young majorette is found murdered near the property of a Chinese wine grower. Although the case appears straightforward, Gendarme captain Claire soon uncovers a complicated web of xenophobia, family troubles and dirty small-town politics.

programme.title: All The Songs We Never Sang
programme.desc: Rebellious teen Natsumi ventures from Tokyo to a small island to meet her aunt and learn the art of pearl diving (but secretly to find a treasure she was told about as a child).

programme.title: The Order Of Things
programme.desc: Corrado, a policeman in charge of immigration control, meets a young Somali woman on a field assignment in Libya, who left her war-ravaged country to go to Europe. He finds himself having to make a choice between obeying his orders and saving her life.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Procession
programme.desc: Marlene Stöhr is shot by a crossbow during the legendary “blood procession” with over 3000 horses and is on life support. Right before she was shot, she saw a precious racehorse presumed dead years ago. Two detectives are called to investigate.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: After The Storm
programme.desc: After a celebration in her rural hometown, Karla Petersen is murdered on her way home. Inspector Helen Dorn takes on the case but clashes with local officer Tom Petersen, Karla's brother, who defies warnings to find his sister's killer.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.

programme.title: Tokyo Fianc ée
programme.desc: A charming and tender tale of young love and cultural discovery. Amélie, a Japanophile young Belgian woman in Tokyo falls into a whirlwind romance with Rinri, a Francophile Japanese student.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelo’s mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mother’s last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: ONE Friday Fights 93
programme.desc: The world’s largest martial arts organization will kick off the new year with a bang when it brings electrifying combat sports action to Lumpinee Stadium in Bangkok, Thailand. ONE Friday Fights 93 goes down live in Asia primetime on January 10 and features 12 Muay Thai and MMA fights, with two-dozen rising stars looking for the coveted US$100,000 contract with ONE Championship. Headlining the event, Rajadamnern Stadium Muay Thai World Champion Kongchai Chanaidonmueang takes on Ramadan Ondash in a thrilling strawweight Muay Thai showdown. Kongchai aims to extend his winning streak, while Ondash chases a third straight victory in the weekly series against his toughest opponent yet. The card also features a clash between Worapon Sor Dechapan and knockout artist Soner Sen in a 142-pound catchweight Muay Thai bout, alongside exciting returns from Lebanese destroyer Abdallah Ondash, Filipina fast-rising star Islay Erika Bomogao, and undefeated Turkish wrestler Dzhabir Dzhabrailov.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night 27: Tang vs. Abdullaev
programme.desc: The world’s largest martial arts organization will return with ONE Fight Night 27: Tang vs. Abdullaev live from Lumpinee Stadium in Bangkok, Thailand. In the headline attraction, ONE Featherweight MMA World Champion Tang Kai defends his belt for the second time against #5-ranked divisional contender Akbar Abdullaev. Tang, China’s first male MMA World Champion, has remained undefeated in ONE Championship, scoring eight victories against the division’s toughest fighters. Now he’s looking to continue his reign of terror against a man who many believe will be the most dangerous opponent he has ever faced. Abdullaev boasts a professional MMA record of 11-0 with a 100 percent finishing rate. The Kyrgyzstan warrior’s sole purpose since joining ONE has been to capture 26 pounds of gold. So far he’s right on schedule, blazing through three fearless featherweights en route to his shot at greatness. In the co-main event, #2-ranked contender Denice Zamboanga meets #4-ranked Alyona Rassohyna...

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: I'm Not In Love
programme.desc: After receiving a marriage ultimatum from a woman he's not sure he truly loves, Rob is up against the clock to realise he should stop looking for the fabled 'Miss Right' and learn to see what's right in front of him.

programme.title: Kill Pinochet
programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. III - Borchert and the Last Hope
programme.desc: Thomas Borchert, an “unlicensed attorney” is consulted by the family of architect Anton Schenider who died from Multiple Sclerosis. The family suspects malpractice on the part of his neurologist, but the autopsy creates more questions than answers.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelo’s mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mother’s last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: Breathless
programme.desc: In an illegal arms case, three men, including two policemen, are dead. Mattheisen reveals a radical right-wing conspiracy, and suspects a mole. However, he is shot dead with Inspector Dorn’s weapon, while Dorn is found at the crime scene with no memory.

programme.title: Tokyo Fianc ée
programme.desc: A charming and tender tale of young love and cultural discovery. Amélie, a Japanophile young Belgian woman in Tokyo falls into a whirlwind romance with Rinri, a Francophile Japanese student.

programme.title: Paris La Blanche
programme.desc: In this parable of migration, Rekia, 70 years-old, leaves Kabylie for Paris to fetch her husband, Nour, back home. Nour has been sustaining the family from abroad for 40 years. Finding help in new friends, she finds Nour but he is a changed man.

programme.title: Roise & Frank
programme.desc: Recently widowed Róise is struggling with her grief following her husband's passing. However, when a stray dog starts to follow her around, she starts to believe that it might be the reincarnation of her husband.

programme.title: M.U.R.B.Y.
programme.desc: In a world where dogs transform into formidable wolves by consuming feathers, Rob, driven by ambition, steals coveted M.U.R.B.Y feathers. However, a gust of wind serves as a twist of fate which sends him on a soul-searching journey of moral dilemmas.

programme.title: Cryptid Hunter
programme.desc: A mockumentary about a passionate monster enthusiast’s search for elusive cryptids like ‘Bigfoot‘ or ‘Nessie‘. However, no matter how hard he tries to find them, he never seems to be able to spot any, even if they were right in front of his very eyes.

programme.title: Stormskerry Maja
programme.desc: At 17, Maja marries humble fisherman Janne and starts a family on the remote island of Stormskerry, where survival is a constant challenge. Amidst the hardships, Maja awakens to her potential, finding resilience and a love that transcends life and death.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.
